path: artifacts/StrongHands 3D Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_path.Migrations: contracts/StrongHands 3D Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/Migrations

findings.title: A.1 Some Non-changing Variables Could be Declared as Constant
findings.description: The name and tinker of the 3D token are variables that have no setter function to update them later in the function.

findings.title: A.2 Non-conformity to Solidity Naming Convention
findings.description: Solidity naming convention aids to improve the readability and conveying of information in contracts.

findings.title: A.3 Some Public Functions could be Declared with External Visibility to Save Gas
findings.description: Whenever a function is not called internally in a contract, it is recommended to declare this function with external visibility instead of public.
